litematica.config.colors.comment.schemat: 覆於異塊之色者，其預定類同，其塊態亦匹。
纂蜃圖而擇畱塊之覆色
纂蜃圖而擇除塊之覆色
纂蜃圖而擇替塊之覆色
litematica.config.generic.comment.areaSe:
存選區之術，依於生界、伺服器
§6註：直播者切勿關之，否則示伺服器之址
§6於導標、選區名、選區徑。
§6重整目錄，得以復之。
litematica.config.generic.comment.better:
啟之則調原版繪碼殊緒以繪蜃圖。可精半透塊之繪，避蜃塊之入地。
若繪得舛（譬Optifine之作祟），且試禁之。
litematica.config.generic.comment.change:
啟之而用置角捷鍵，
則選區之角恆爲末移者
litematica.config.generic.comment.cloneA:
啟之而用[複製選區]捷鍵，
則立布置於原選區，而非戲者之所在
litematica.config.generic.comment.comman:
啟之則禁回令，而啟謄、塡、刪之術（用/setblock與/fill之令者）於眾戲
事達則復啟回令之章則。

以令塡除塊方之尺寸之極。
若有廣域，越乎此限，則分令施行。
塡除之令，不論廣狹，初其施行，皆以區塊豫割之。
禁割塡積如塊匡（於塡、替、刪諸式）

每刻施令之極。
於伺服器行謄、塡、刪之諸術，發/setblock與/fill之諸令者，無不受之。
註：若以謄術繕名錄籤，或稍逾期，蓋因每塊額需二令。

伺服器創式者所用clone之令名。
若[謄繕名錄籤之法]設如[置 與 /clone]，則謄術用之。
伺服器創式者所用fill之令名

伺服器創式者所用setblock之令名。
惟謄蜃圖之術用之

伺服器創式者所用summon之令名。
惟謄蜃圖之術用之

謄、塡、刪眾令施行之間隔，以刻計。
彼[施令制限]者，所以設每施令數之極，
此[施令間隔]者，所以設每施令之間歇。

啟之則用纂世（World Edit）改囊
//pos1、//pos2、//set之令，而非所配塡置之令。

註：礙於命令限速、纂世命令之繁（//pos1 //pos2 //set），纂世之令乃慢三倍有餘。

§6誡：若用纂世之令而未獨用塡令，則廢[謄替之法]！
故若君有施令權術，則薦以原版之令爲佳。

惟用纂世之令於斯境也：
伺服器未載「氍毹」改囊，無以施「/carpet fillUpdates false」之時，則可以纂世之令辟塊方迭更。
litematica.config.generic.comment.custom:
若[啟自定蜃圖根目錄]既啟
則以此爲蜃圖根目錄

啟之則以[自定蜃圖根目錄]之所定
爲蜃圖根目錄，
而非預設者「.minecraft/schematics/」也
litematica.config.generic.comment.datafi:
原版繕錄器預設架構直

以是裁定之至低直，若載蜃圖，而不函此直，亦用之。

§6誡：惟受「清影」碼師之導引者，可以纂之，及摩挲本尊。

§6若存疑慮，且守礦藝一點一二之預設。§r

可配繕錄之階，以施於所載蜃圖。
此術可越原版繕錄器，以增載錄之效能，
然若輒廢不用，恐致數據傾頹之患。
litematica.config.generic.comment.debugH:
易「清影」世繪器所示勘誤浮文於F3之幕。
[§e預設§r]：駐於「F3+F6」助文之上。（經典）
[§b原版配置§r：諾憑原版「F3+F6」以配置「清影」F3勘誤浮文。
[§c關§r]：關「清影」F3勘誤介面。

§6註：啟原版配置或並改諸勘誤文。
§6此乃「F3+F6」所以鋻浮文尺寸而顯於幕。
§6其實視效，因於調數，或有未期之變焉。
litematica.config.generic.comment.debugL: 啟勘誤日誌於控制台以勘誤除謬。
litematica.config.generic.comment.displa:
Display file operation confirmation feedback.
§7Example: Deleting a file will display a message
§7confirming that the operation was successful.
litematica.config.generic.comment.easyPl:
用[易置之擊鄰塊]而以一點一二版Ornithe爲義。
與§a[易置之覆寫]§r同習之乃有奇效焉。

This causes the Easy Place mode to place the first/closest block
you are looking at first, instead of the furthest/bottom-most block.
Setting this to false allows you to place multiple layers "at once",
since the furthest blocks would be placed before the closer ones block the line of sight.

When enabled, then you can hold down the use key
and look at different schematic blocks to place them,
without having to click on every block individually.
啟之而向蜃塊，且試施物置塊，自將置於其位

啟之則習易置「覆寫」之式
於一點一二版Ornithe之碼。
§6誡！§r§6§l惟可一試耳§r§r

所用易置之法：
- 自取：獨戲則用v3，眾戲則用惟版。
  若伺服器載「氍毹」改囊且傳令曰「carpet:hello」則用v2於是伺服器。
- v3：「清影」改囊之內成，抑有「伺服司」之助。
- v2：載「氍毹」改囊者皆可用之，（需有「精審置塊」之規在先）。
- 惟版：惟繕頂版。可用於紙鳶端。
- 無：弗改座標。

If enabled, then Litematica handles the so called
"Carpet mod Accurate Block Placement Protocol" itself in single player.
This is recommended to be kept enabled if you
are going to use Easy Place in single player.

The interval in milliseconds the Easy Place mode waits
after swapping inventory slots and placing a block.
Useful to avoid placing wrong blocks when having high ping.

If enabled, reduces reach distance from +1.0 to the
Vanilla value so servers don't reject placement of
far blocks.
litematica.config.generic.comment.enable:
If enabled, the "Wrong Block" verifier displays
will potentially show a "Different Blocks" status
based on various Block Tag groupings; where this is only
shown if the Block State matches; or else it
will result in a "Wrong State" result.
You could then disable this overlay rendering under Visuals.
Example:  Using white glass instead of glass;
or stone brick walls instead of deep slate brick walls.
litematica.config.generic.comment.entity:
以「伺服司」同調之方
得實體之錄於伺服器

「伺服司」禁則詢以原版名錄籤。
此法需吏權。

實體快取之存期，以秒計。
低則屢迭更，高則利蜃圖名錄籤之存。

載同調名錄籤至客端之世。
§6誡！若有用此錄之改囊，此術或與之不容。
litematica.config.generic.comment.execut: 需持工具在身以用施工捷鍵
litematica.config.generic.comment.fixRai:
If true, then a fix is applied for the vanilla bug in rails,
where the 180 degree rotations of straight north-south and
east-west rails rotate 90 degrees counterclockwise instead >_>
litematica.config.generic.comment.fixSta:
If true, then a fix is applied for the vanilla bug in stairs,
where the Stair Shapes are not handled correctly depending
on which Block Facing Axis they are oriented upon.
litematica.config.generic.comment.genera:
If enabled, then by default the suggested schematic names
will be lowercase and using underscores instead of spaces
litematica.config.generic.comment.highli:
啟之則彰皿中相應之物
（贆櫝所藏之物亦彰之）
litematica.config.generic.comment.itemUs:
Bypass the new distance/coordinate check that was added in 1.18.2.

That check breaks the "accurate placement protocol" and causes
any blocks placed with a rotation (or other property) request to just become ghost blocks.

There is basically no need to ever disable this.
The check didn't even exist ever before 1.18.2.
litematica.config.generic.comment.layerM:
If true, then the render layer follows the player.
Note: This currently collapses Layer Range type ranges unfortunately
litematica.config.generic.comment.loadEn:
啟之則載蜃圖之全圖。
棄之則止載視距之內。
litematica.config.generic.comment.materi: When enabled, the exact block state is ignored, and only the block type needs to match

When enabled, the material list Raw Materials
will export a debug level recipe details output
in addition to the recipe steps and simplified reports.
litematica.config.generic.comment.pasteA: 強用/fill之令（而棄/setblock）縱惟有單塊
litematica.config.generic.comment.pasteI:
If enabled, then block entities are not pasted at all
via the command-based pasting in multiplayer.
This allows you to easier paste in two passes if you
want to use the NBT-restore option for inventories etc. in the second pass,
which usually requires a lot slower pasting speed/command rate.

If enabled, then all block entities are ignored from the fill
commands when pasting. This allows them to get pasted individually,
which is required if the NBT restore option is being used.

If enabled, then the command limit is ignored when pasting
blocks with a block entity with the NBT restore option enabled.
This seems to somehow fix an issue where the NBT restore
would otherwise fail for many blocks with a low command rate.
litematica.config.generic.comment.pasteL: 謄蜃圖工式之謄層之法
litematica.config.generic.comment.pasteN:
欲繕塊方名錄籤乎？以何術繕之乎？

- [置 與 /data modify]：置「名錄籤」之塊於戲者近身，後以 /data modify 之令傳至於 /setblock 所置之塊。
- [置 與 /clone]：置「名錄籤」之塊於戲者近身，後複製於其正位。
- [/teleport 與 置]：傳戲者至其鄰，後直置「名錄籤」之塊於其正位。

註：[/teleport 與 置] 之術尚不可用也。
薦以 §e[置 與 /data modify]§r 之術爲佳。欲令其作工無誤，或須緩[施令制限]爲每刻一施，且增[施令間隔]一暨四刻。
以是惟用是術於謄需錄之要塊，如製惟函行囊之蜃圖，且將替式設爲「無」而謄之。
litematica.config.generic.comment.pasteR: 謄蜃圖工式之替塊之法
litematica.config.generic.comment.pasteT:
啟之則不謄蜃圖於世，
而錄Setblock之令入文案。
litematica.config.generic.comment.pasteU:
If enabled, then instead of only using individual /setblock commands,
the command-based Paste operation (which is used on servers)
will also try to use /fill commands for any continuous areas of the same block.
This has no effect in single player, since the mod sets the blocks directly
in the integrated server's world in and doesn't use commands at all.

This is a temporary hack workaround to use the command-based pasting
also in single player, which allows using the render layer limited
pasting in single player, which currently doesn't work with
the direct world access pasting that single player normally uses.

Note that this will have all the same NBT data restoration
limitations that multiplayer pasting has normally.

以「伺服司」直謄蜃圖於伺服器。
此術疾於凡命令之術，亦可繕實體名錄籤。
§6註：此術須藉「伺服司」啟[§d同調實體錄§6]於伺服器以用。§r
litematica.config.generic.comment.pickBl: 取塊而避可損之物於捷槽

辟替工具於捷槽。

原版工器之類者，皆不得替捷槽。

啟蜃世[取塊]捷鍵。
亦有他鍵以迭是項…o.o

啟[取塊而不顧名錄籤]之功，
用於一點一二版Ornithe之[易置之覆寫]。

If enabled, then if the required item for the pick block
is not found directly in the player's inventory, but there
is a Shulker box that contains it, the Shulker Box
will be switched to the player's hand instead
捷槽之用以取蜃圖之塊
litematica.config.generic.comment.placem:
The block replace behavior when adding blocks
to the schematic world.

This allows using overlapped placements without the
later handled placement always overwriting earlier ones with air.
On the other hand some blocks like light blocks are considered
to be air, so they would need the "All" replace behavior
to get placed at all.

When enabled, the use key can only be used
when holding the correct item for the targeted position,
and the targeted position must have a missing block in the schematic

Selects which type of warning message to show (if any)
when either the Easy Place mode or Placement Restriction prevent placing a block
litematica.config.generic.comment.recipe:
In Single Player, unlock the full Server Recipe Book
for the player to improve the Raw Material List output results.
This option requires a client restart or relog to take effect.
litematica.config.generic.comment.render:
廢繪緒之期限。
若遇宏圖，繪徐受阻，且禁是項。
然禁之或遲繪圖。
litematica.config.generic.comment.schema:
除舊版蜃圖之式
謄新版於蜃圖版調之時可用之。
litematica.config.generic.comment.select: 選區之式（角 抑或 展）
litematica.config.generic.comment.server: 伺服器同調實體錄之限
litematica.config.generic.comment.signTe: 鈔牌文於蜃圖而不藉人力
litematica.config.generic.comment.toolIt: 是物有改圖作工之功用也。

工具之錄元。
設如「empty」以禁之。
可用「/give」之文法。
啟之則以是物調適選區。
litematica.config.generic.comment.unhide:
Un-hides the Schematic VCS (Version Control System) menu button,
and enables the hotkey and the VCS functionality in general.
(This was called Schematic Projects before.)

In general you §6should not§r be using this feature,
unless you really know how it works and what it does.
It somewhat changes how the area selections, placements and pasting works,
in particular that there is also an area delete operation when pasting.

Basically this feature is intended for §6iterative, in-place§r design work,
and it allows you to easier create multiple versions/snapshots
of the same build, and also to switch between the versions by deleting what is
in the world first, and then pasting the next version in its place.
litematica.config.generic.name.pasteIgno: 謄而無施令與名錄籤之限
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.addSel: 於此添新選區匡（方位一）
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.cloneS:
Quickly clone the current area selection.
This basically just creates an in-memory-only schematic,
and then creates a placement of that schematic and selects it,
and also switches the tool mode to the Paste mode.
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.easyPl: 迭[易置之近者爲先]之開關
若[易置]既用，則以此鍵置塊
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.execut:
施行所擇之事：
塡、替、謄諸等
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.invert: 押是鍵則迭蜃塊幻塊之繪
押是鍵則迭勘誤器之繪
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.nudgeS:
移選區於負軸
此與擪綴鍵而下移滑鼠滾輪無異

移選區於正軸
此與擪綴鍵而上移滑鼠滾輪無異
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.openGu: 爲所擇之區開選區置設介面
爲所擇之圖開用材表介面
爲所擇之圖抑子域開置蜃圖介面
爲所擇之圖開驗圖器介面
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.operat:
[擇式綴鍵]所用之綴鍵。
持「工具」而押且轆之以速迭擇式。
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.pickBl:
此鍵用以取
所向蜃塊之最近者

A key to pick block the last schematic block
ray traced to, before the first (possible) client world
block ray traced to. Basically this would get
you the block you could place against an existing block.

迭[取塊之迭]之捷鍵於貫用配置。
若捷鍵紊，則所以速啟禁取塊鍵。
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.render:
啟塊訊覆層之鍵。
以「NONE」示鍵之不需者，可設「允空鍵」於精進鍵設。
禁名似之項於「觀」以禁覆層。
§6註：此術須藉「伺服司」啟[§d同調實體錄§6]於伺服器以用。§r

A hotkey to allow the overlays to render through blocks.
This is just a quicker way to temporarily enable
the same thing that the 'schematicOverlayRenderThroughBlocks' option in Visuals does.
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.rerend:
重整、重繪蜃圖之捷鍵
而無須以F3 + A重繪地勢
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.saveAr: 存所擇選區之蜃圖入案
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.schema:
[畱同除異]所用之綴鍵。
押是鍵而擇一塊，則異塊悉除乎蜃圖。

若於纂蜃圖之式
此綴鍵則以啟破置同塊之術

若於纂蜃圖之式
此綴鍵則以啟增刪之術而定向不輟

若於纂蜃圖之式
此綴鍵則以啟替換同塊之術

若於纂蜃圖之式
此綴鍵則以啟替塊之術

若於纂蜃圖之式
此綴鍵則以啟替換之術而定向不輟

鈔選區塊至清影快取之捷鍵。
坤籌者嘗諫「重影」增此術。

A key to delete blocks from the world based on the currently
selected version's placement.
See Generic -> 'schematicVcsDeleteMode' for the delete mode/behavior

[迭蜃版綴鍵]所押之綴鍵。
以是旋滑輪而迭蜃圖之版。
迭次蜃版於版調工式之捷鍵
迭嚮蜃版於版調工式之捷鍵
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.select:
「取」選區之綴鍵
以是擇匡角等以移。

The action hotkey to auto-grow the selection box around
any adjacent/diagonally connected blocks

[擴選區]所押之綴鍵。
以是輪之而易選區之廣狹。

若處擇區之式
則以此鍵則改角點之式

移區所押之綴鍵
以是微移所則選區暨角

The action hotkey to shrink the selection box so that there
isn't any empty space (empty layers) on any side
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.setAre: 設移選區原點至戲者之所在
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.setSel: 設選區角一至戲者之所在
設選區角二至戲者之所在
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.toggle: 迭[勘誤器蜃塊之繪]之開關
迭[勘誤器側邊之繪]之開關
迭[蜃圖之繪]（塊與覆）之開關
迭[鈔牌文]之用（存乎貫用之類）
迭 透/實 幻塊之繪
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.toolSe:
[工具]所用之鍵，
以是擇角抑匡

[擇元]所押之綴鍵，
以是擇主塊之類爲用者

[擇元]所押之綴鍵，
以是擇副塊之類爲用者
litematica.config.hotkeys.comment.unload: 解載所擇蜃圖，並咸除其子域
啟之而眈視一塊，則繪「眇訊」之塊訊

啟塊訊之繪
押[繪塊訊]之鍵位，則示所見之塊訊，驗圖器之誌誤
§6註：此術須藉「伺服司」啟[§d同調實體錄§6]於伺服器以用。§r
塊訊所現縱偏幕沿之距

設預設選區之式於闢新世之時。
- 易式則立選匡於[§d0, 0, 0§r]。
- 凡式則躬身自定選區。
[訊息簡訊]齊整之法，見於用材表、驗圖器諸等。

When enabled, the Block Info Overlay and Block Info Lines
will be able to ray trace to fluid blocks instead of going through them

Enable a status info HUD renderer,
which renders a few bits of status info, such as
the current layer mode and renderers enabled state

Allow automatically momentarily enabling the status info HUD "when needed",
for example when creating a placement and having rendering disabled
[工具簡訊]齊整之法，持自設「工具」則見
工具簡訊橫偏幕沿之距
工具簡訊縱偏幕沿之距

Should the warning message about being in a layer mode
or having some of the rendering options disabled
be shown when loading a new schematic
or creating a new placement
litematica.config.visuals.comment.enable: 總繪迭鈕。以調是改囊全繪之開關。

啟蜃塊之繪。
禁則惟可見其態，不可見其塊

Enable the Fake Lighting Provider,
which has always been the default before.
Disable this to use a Vanilla lighting provider,
and then enable "renderAOModernEnable"
to get the full vanilla-like lighting effects.
This is mainly useful for when using shaders.

啟蜃液之繪。
禁之方令君明見塊暨覆層。
此亦並除流域之示。
litematica.config.visuals.comment.ghostB:
此乃幻塊之虛實，
繪於半透者。
§6註：§7亦須同啟[繪塊如半透]者！
litematica.config.visuals.comment.ignora:
Lists of comma-seperated block-IDs and block-tag-IDs
which are ignored when building
a schematic (e.g. minecraft:stone_slab,
minecraft:smooth_stone_slab, #minecraft:wooden_slabs).
Invalid IDs are ignored.
litematica.config.visuals.comment.ignore: 疏略[略現存之塊]所記之塊於營造之時。

If enabled, then any fluid blocks are ignored as "extra blocks"
and as "wrong blocks", ie. where the schematic has air or other blocks.
Basically this makes building stuff under water a whole lot less annoying.
Note: You will most likely also want to enable the 'renderCollidingSchematicBlocks'
option at the same time, to allow the blocks to get rendered inside fluids.
litematica.config.visuals.comment.overla:
If enabled, then the adjacent/touching inner sides
for the block overlays are removed/not rendered
litematica.config.visuals.comment.render:
啟[新皴法之繪]，乃繕陰翳之謬。
而或致旁層之影，映於蜃圖，礙汝工事。
啟之則以半透幻塊繪蜃圖

If enabled, then blocks in the schematics are rendered
also when there is already a (wrong) block in the client world.
Probably mostly useful when trying to build
something where there are snow layers or water in the way.
啟之以序蜃圖半透層之繪

繪聯綫於驗圖器彰匡之角。
或嘗歷經，本未期繪誤也
而或有樂之，欲將錯就錯而畱之，乃以此項「回復」是術
啟之則以誌誤器繪半透面於驗圖器，而非祇繪廓綫於外。

擬光器之光階。
人常設之以十五，亦可自調其明晦。
啟「啟新皴法之繪」以用之。
啟之則繪側矩於蜃圖子域匡
啟之則繪函匡於蜃圖諸子域（布置）
啟之則繪側矩於蜃圖周匝函匡

繪蜃圖行緒之極
此將動效能之固

§6§l審慎而行！§r§r§6需辭戲而復入以生效焉。

啟之則繪實體於蜃圖。
若實體亦有塊模，則仍繪之如塊方。
啟之則亦繪模型内面於半透之式
litematica.config.visuals.comment.schema: 啟之以序勘誤蜃塊之繪
啟之則繪蜃塊半透箱側

啟之則當以塊模角點繪蜃圖覆層，
而棄古法全塊覆層也。

啟之則當以塊模矩繪蜃圖覆層，
而棄古法全塊覆層也。
覆層繪經於塊，其模塊廓綫之濃淡

If enabled, then the schematic overlay will be rendered
through blocks. This is probably only useful once you are
finished building and want to see any errors easier

啟各塊蜃圖之繪。詳見[啟異塊之繪]
若有塊態同而籤異，所以彰之。
諸如階、垣、艸、砼、琉璃等，材同而色異者。

Forces using blocks models for everything in the Schematic Verifier
result list. Normally item models are used for anything
that has an item, and block models are only used for blocks
that don't have an item, plus for Flower Pots to see the contained item.
litematica.config.visuals.name.schematic: 繪蜃圖透視廓綫之濃淡

litematica.gui.button.hover.material_lis:
Clears the Material Cache
Normally this should not be needed
This can be used instead of deleting the 'material_cache.nbt'
file in case the cache has some wrong data, like items
stored for blocks that shouldn't have them, like piston heads

Hold shift to write the missing raw materials only; and optionally
hold alt to prioritize crafting recipes over stonecutter recipes

而非凡ASCII-art表文案

左擊以增

litematica.gui.button.hover.schematic_li:
復載蜃圖於案。
若爾嘗疏忽於纂蜃圖之時，或有益也。
litematica.gui.button.hover.schematic_pr:
There is currently a Schematic VCS project open.
The Schematic VCS mode overrides the normal area selection functionality

(This was called Schematic Projects before.)
In general you §6should not§r be using this feature,
unless you really know how it works and what it does.
It somewhat changes how the area selections, placements and pasting works,
in particular that there is also an area delete operation when pasting.

Basically this feature is intended for §6iterative, in-place§r design work,
and it allows you to easier create multiple versions/snapshots
of the same build, and also to switch between the versions by deleting what is
in the world first, and then pasting the next version in its place.

移工程原點至戲者之所在
亦將隨之移選區且布置

§6Warning: This will delete/overwrite the current blocks
§6in the world within the area that was previously
§6placed from a version, or saved as a version
§6(basically the last seen "effective area selection")
存新蜃圖抑版至此工程

and doesn't prevent entity rendering.

the placement entirely

亟立新一布置
且自擇其布置
litematica.gui.label.schematic_save.hove:
If enabled, then the schematic is created by saving the
contents of the selection from the schematic world
instead of the normal vanilla world.
This allows you to combine or trim schematics without having
to paste them to a temporary creative world.

Include any necessary support blocks in "Visible blocks only" mode,
for things like Repeaters, Comparators, Carpets or gravity blocks that would be visible
litematica.gui.message.schematic_project:
Do you want to delete the "last affected" area?
This will delete whatever blocks and entities are within the area that the project manager last placed to the world, or last saved as a version. (Basically the "last seen affected area", such that if you were to cycle versions, it would not leave blocks behind from the previous version.)

Do you want to place this version to the world?
It will delete whatever blocks are within the area that the project manager last placed to the world, or last saved as a version. (Basically the "last seen affected area", such that if you were to cycle versions, it would not leave blocks behind from the previous version.)
litematica.gui.title.create_area_selecti: 立新選區於蜃圖之所在
litematica.hud.misc.renderer_status: 繪器：區：%s 蜃圖：%s 塊：%s 原點：%s 選區：%s

定此坐標

litematica.info.material_list:
- The Material List hotkey will open the last viewed Material List,
   if there is one stored
- To switch to a different Material List, open one via
   the GUI button in the Placement Configuration GUI or
   the schematic browser
- The stored/last viewed list is also forgot
   if the selected Schematic Placement is changed
- If there is no last viewed Material List yet,
   then the selected Placement is used, if there is one
litematica.info.schematic_manager.previe:
- 右擊其鈕以罷預覽之舉
- Ctrl+Alt+Shift並擊則設既存PNG圖「thumb.png」
  爲縮圖於蜃圖目錄之所在。

以[爲屏作畫]之鍵設其預覽圖。
亦可右擊[設預覽]之鈕以罷免。

誡：蜃塊已禁繪
見 觀→%s，抑或 捷鍵→%s[「%s」]
litematica.message.warn.schematic_load_n:
Warning: When you directly load non-Litematica schematics, the created placements won't be persistent.
Also if you have to load the schematic many times, then the schematic type conversion lag spike (for large schematics) will happen each time you load it.

It is therefore recommended to either import the schematic and save it in the Litematica format via the Schematic Manager menu, or better yet, paste the original schematic into a temporary world using MCEdit or the Paste mode in Litematica, and then make a new Litematica schematic from that, preferably using multiple sub-regions to tightly capture the build, where applicable.
litematica.message.warn.schematic_rebuil: The targeted placement is currently not selected. The Replace All hotkey only works on the currently selected sub-region(s) of the placement you click on. So to replace the blocks in only one sub-region, select that sub-region. To replace in the entire schematic (all sub-regions), select the entire placement and not a sub-region of it. The blocks are also only replaced within the area limited by the current Render Layers setting.
litematica.message.warn.schematic_render:
誡：蜃圖已禁繪
見 觀→%s，抑或 捷鍵→%s[「%s」]
litematica.message.warn.schematic_verifi:
誡：驗器覆繪已禁！
見覆訊→%s（抑或 捷鍵→%s[「%s」]）
litematica.message.warning.schematic_pro: Warning: The Schematic Version Control System is currently hidden. In general you should NOT use this, unless you really know how it works and changes some of the mod behavior. It is meant for iteratire, in-place design work, where flipping between different versions of the build in-place (= deleting and replacing the previous version) is needed. If you want to use it, then enable the option Generic -> unhideSchematicVCS
litematica.warning.area_editor.area_rend:
註：選區之繪既祛
